measured_by: proportion of risky choices in the fixed-vs-risky option task
justification: "The primary dependent measure was the proportion of risky choices in the final training blocks and in the test blocks."
"After the choice task, memory for the outcomes associated with each option was tested … participants were shown the eight options … and asked to report the first outcome that came to mind."

"Second, participants were again shown the eight options … and asked to judge the frequency in percent of each possible outcome … For each option, these nine possible outcomes were displayed simultaneously, and participants typed a number from 0 to 100 below each respective outcome."
